freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign id>${row["ID"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign authors>${row["Authors"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign year>${row["Year"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign title>${row["Title"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign publication>${row["Publication"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign pub_location>${row["PublicationLocation"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign web_link>${row["WebLink"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug_resistance_publication "${id}" custom-table-row drug_resistance_publication "${id}" set field authors "${authors}" set field year "${year}" set field title "${title}" set field publication "${publication}" set field pub_location "${pub_location}" set field web_link "${web_link}" exit </#list>
